pages.title: Natural Resources
pages.text: Found deep within the world’s forests and ruins, these resources carry the essence of life and age. Though humble in appearance, they are vital to Hexalia’s craftwork and rituals.

pages.title: Tree Resin
pages.text: A sticky, aromatic substance harvested from $(bold)Dark Oak$() and $(bold)Cottonwood Logs$(). Extract it using an $(l:hexalia:content/tools#athame)Athame$(/l), stripping the bark in the process.$(br2)Used in crafting adhesives and preservation formulas.

pages.title: Ancient Seed
pages.text: A rare artifact pulsing with primordial life energy. Found in $(bold)Jungle Pyramid$() chests.$(br2)Can be transformed through a $(l:hexalia:core_mechanics/natures_ritual)Nature’s Ritual$(/l) into the $(l:hexalia:content/weapons_combat_tools#kelpweave_blade)Kelpweave Blade$(/l).
